key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to fetch new exchange rates from the API

key.name: primary-currency
key.description: The primary fiat currency in which prices should be displayed

key.name: metals-unit
key.description: Unit for displaying metal prices: gram or troy-ounce

key.name: show-currency-in-panel
key.description: Display the currency symbol or code alongside rates in the panel

key.name: max-panel-items
key.description: Maximum number of rates to display in the panel

key.name: panel-sort-order
key.description: How to sort panel items: none, symbol-asc, symbol-desc, price-asc, price-desc

key.name: panel-separator
key.description: Separator between items in the panel

key.name: panel-item-template
key.description: Template for displaying items in the panel. Use {symbol} and {rate} as placeholders.

key.name: menu-item-template
key.description: Template for displaying items in the dropdown menu. Use {symbol} and {rate} as placeholders.

key.name: clipboard-notification
key.description: Show a notification when a rate is copied to clipboard

key.name: clipboard-template
key.description: Template for copying to clipboard when using display format. Use {symbol} and {rate} as placeholders.

key.name: clipboard-format
key.description: Format of copied text: display-format, formatted-price or price-only

key.name: number-format
key.description: How numbers are formatted: auto, fixed, locale, or compact

key.name: decimal-places
key.description: Number of decimal places to display (0-10)

key.name: use-currency-symbols
key.description: Use symbols like €, $, £ instead of currency codes

key.name: symbol-position
key.description: Where to place the currency symbol: before or after the price

key.name: watched-fiat
key.description: List of fiat currency symbols to monitor

key.name: panel-fiat
key.description: Fiat currencies to show in the panel

key.name: watched-metals
key.description: List of metal symbols to monitor

key.name: panel-metals
key.description: Metals to show in the panel

key.name: watched-crypto
key.description: List of cryptocurrency symbols to monitor

key.name: panel-crypto
key.description: Cryptocurrencies to show in the panel

key.name: watched-stocks
key.description: List of stock symbols to monitor

key.name: panel-stocks
key.description: Stocks to show in the panel
